The Leveller: or, The principles & maxims concerning government and religion, vvhich are asserted by those that are commonly called Levellers.
16 p.
printed, for Thomas Brewster, at the Three Bibles, at the west-end of Pauls, London : 1659.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "feb: 16.th. Feb. 16 1658"; the 9 in the imprint date has been crossed out and replaced with a "9". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
